programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Prologue
programme.desc: Prologue. The first contests on this years edition of the Dakar took place at the gateway to the city of Bisha, on a terrain with a sequence of sandy tracks.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 1
programme.desc: Stage 1. Travelling south from Bisha, the air gets thinner and thinner as the road approaches 1,300 metres. The drop in oxygen levels is barely noticeable, but the landscape is no longer the same.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 2A
programme.desc: Stage 2A. The return journey to Bisha to complete the 48 HR Chrono expedition to the northeast of the city required passing through a 90-kilometre portion of grey dunes.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 2B
programme.desc: Stage 2B. The return journey to Bisha to complete the 48 HR Chrono expedition to the northeast of the city required passing through a 90-kilometre portion of grey dunes.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 3
programme.desc: Stage 3. The riders, drivers and crews dropped down by about 500 metres in altitude and especially had to tackle a beginning to the special that was very rocky, before picking up speed on sandy plateaus for approximately 200 kilometres.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 4
programme.desc: Stage 4. Prior to camping out in Berber tents, the competitors weaved their way around canyons, surged up rocky plateaus and turned on the afterburners on flat sandy expanses.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 5
programme.desc: Stage 5. The navigation was tricky on the last part of the special, where taking care of tyres was especially important on the terrain made up of large gravel.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Rest Day
programme.desc: Rest Day. 2025 will be the 47th edition of the Dakar Rally, organized by Amaury Sport Organisation (ASO), and the 6th time Saudi Arabia has hosted the event.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 6
programme.desc: Stage 6. Clarity of mind was essential to finding the way out of this maze of dunes ranging from white to saffron yellow depending on the angle of the light or the composition of the sand.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 7
programme.desc: Stage 7. The stage dazzled with views of Riyadh Province after rolling out of Al Duwadimi for a wide loop to the south-west of the city, stretching for a shade over 410 km.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 8
programme.desc: Stage 8. The days special took place to the south of the capital, on split routes for the FIM and FIA vehicles, but both over distances of more than 480 kilometres.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 9
programme.desc: Stage 9. Over a distance of 357 kilometres and at a high pace requiring speedy roadbook reading, the main pitfalls to be concerned about was in regards to navigation.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 10
programme.desc: Stage 10. The field rolled out of Haradh to tackle a road section of more than 500 kilometres on route to the shores of the Arabian Gulf.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 11
programme.desc: Stage 11. There was a delay to the start of the stage which incited the bikers to request that the stage be shortened to 152km instead of the original 308km.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Stage 12
programme.desc: Stage 12. The 47th edition of the Dakar and the 6th in Saudi Arabia was completed in Shubaytah by 175 vehicles - 77 bikes, 40 Ultimate cars, 1 Stock car, 21 Challengers, 23 SSVs and 13 trucks.

programme.title: Dakar HL 25: Event
programme.desc: Event. 2025 will be the 47th edition of the Dakar Rally, organized by Amaury Sport Organisation (ASO), and the 6th time Saudi Arabia has hosted the event.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: NGR v CMR
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Nigeria vs Cameroon. Nigerias quick transitions and clinical finishing exposed Cameroons defensive lapses in a high-tempo clash.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: ANG v NAM
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Angola vs Namibia. Angolas tournament experience and composure under pressure proved too much for Namibias youthful energy.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: GEQ v GUI
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Equatorial Guinea vs Guinea. Guineas disciplined shape and patient buildup eventually wore down Equatorial Guineas aggressive surges.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: EGY v COD
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Egypt vs DR Congo. Egypt controlled possession, but DR Congos resilience and physical battles kept the contest tense.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: CPV v MTN
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Cape Verde vs Mauritania. Cape Verdes compact organization and smart pressing limited Mauritanias attacking options.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: SEN v CIV
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Senegal vs Côte dIvoire. Côte dIvoires strength and direct play tested Senegals defensive resolve in a tight, physical duel.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: MLI v BFA
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Mali vs Burkina Faso. Malis midfield dominance dictated tempo, neutralizing Burkina Fasos counterattacking threat.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23: MOR v RSA
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Round of 16: Morocco vs South Africa. Moroccos tactical discipline and structured pressing contained South Africas pace on the break.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 QF1: NGR v ANG
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Quarter-final 1: Nigeria vs Angola. Nigerias relentless intensity and attacking waves eventually broke Angolas defensive resistance.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 QF2: COD v GUI
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Quarter-final 2: DR Congo vs Guinea. DR Congos physical approach and aerial strength gradually dismantled Guineas organized structure.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 QF3: MLI v CIV
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Quarter-final 3: Mali vs Côte dIvoire. Côte dIvoires attacking depth and creativity overcame Malis midfield control.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 QF4: CPV v RSA
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Blitz Highlights - Quarter-final 4: Cape Verde vs South Africa. South Africas direct, fast play disrupted Cape Verdes rhythm and defensive organization.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 SF1: NGR v RSA
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Semi-final 1: Nigeria vs South Africa. Nigerias defensive solidity and swift counters held off South Africas late surge in a tense semi-final.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 SF2: CIV v COD
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Semi-final 2: Côte dIvoire vs DR Congo. Côte dIvoires composure and home support carried them past DR Congos physical challenge.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 3rd: RSA v COD
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - 3rd Place: South Africa vs DR Congo. A tight, nervy contest where South Africas resilience edged DR Congos physical approach, securing a podium finish.

programme.title: AFCON HL 23 Final: NGR v CIV
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Final: Nigeria vs Côte dIvoire. Nigerias early control gave way to Côte dIvoires determined fightback, as the hosts rose to the occasion in a dramatic final.

programme.title: AFCON 23 Final: NGR v CIV
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations - Final: Nigeria vs Côte dIvoire. Nigerias early control gave way to Côte dIvoires determined fightback, as the hosts rose to the occasion in a dramatic final.

programme.desc: Total Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Final: Zambia vs Ivory Coast. From Libreville, Gabon.

programme.title: AFCON HL 13 Final: NGR v BFA
programme.desc: Total Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Final: Nigeria vs Burkina Faso. From National Stadium - Johannesburg, South Africa.

programme.title: AFCON HL 15 Final: CIV v GHA
programme.desc: Total Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Final: Ivory Coast vs Ghana. A tense West African derby ended in a dramatic shootout, finally delivering glory to Ivory Coast.

programme.title: AFCON HL 17 Final: EGY v CMR
programme.desc: Total Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Final: Egypt vs Cameroon. Egypts control was undone by Cameroons spirited late fightback, sealing a famous comeback win.

programme.title: AFCON HL 19 Final: SEN v ALG
programme.desc: Total Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Final: Senegal vs Algeria. Senegals power met Algerias intensity, with Belmadis side striking early and holding firm.

programme.title: AFCON HL 21 Final: SEN v EGY
programme.desc: TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Highlights - Final: Senegal vs Egypt. A tense battle of resilience, with Senegals persistence finally breaking Egypts defensive wall.
